attributes.action: Replace Council tax with a local tax for All Adults to pay irrespective of income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the council tax is unfair and penilises people who save and develop their own properties.
A Council tax should be based on the use of council services and therefore based on the number of adults in a property, not the size or facilities of a property.
Two adults in a house do not have the same impact on public services as 5 or 6 adults in a property.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
